meanings.definition: A large truck designed to carry heavy loads, typically with a detachable trailer.
meanings.sent1: The semitruck rumbled down the highway, carrying a load of furniture.
meanings.sent2: I saw a semitruck delivering packages to the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The semitruck seemed to have a mind of its own, honking at passing cars.
meanings.sent4: The semitruck was a giant metal beast, devouring the road ahead.
meanings.sent5: The shiny semitruck gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of transportation power.

meanings.definition: To transport goods using a semitruck.
meanings.sent1: We will semitruck the supplies to the construction site tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: They semitruck fresh produce from the farm to the market every week.
meanings.sent3: I semitrucked the party decorations to the venue in style.
meanings.sent4: She semitrucks her handmade crafts to different fairs around the state.
meanings.sent5: The company semitrucks its products across the country, ensuring timely delivery.
